title: Pan-fried Cod
directions: In a non-stick pan on medium-high heat, melt about a table spoon of ghee. Lay down the filets and give the pan a shake, to make sure that the melted ghee coats the pan evenly. Cook the first side for about 6 minutes. Drizzle some olive oil on the non-cooked side (to make sure that the fish doesn’t dry out when you flip it onto the other side).
ingredients: Here’s how I cooked our cod filets:
Season the cod filets with salt, pepper, and a light sprinkling of garlic powder. Then, very lightly coat the filets with organic coconut flour.
